𐀷𐀙𐀭 wa-na-sa Fάνασσα Phoenicia Φάνης Phánēs Vanessa Venus "queen"

corrupted / confused sign

𐀷-𐀜 wa-no •name of oxen (?)
𐀹-𐀪-𐀜 wi-ri-no cow hides •ox-hides ⇔ ῥινός skin of man and animal

𐀺-𐀜-𐀷-𐀴-𐀯 wo-no-ᵍwa-ti-si winegarden part?
